name: Musik-Saya
description: Open-Source bot to play songs in your Telegram's Group Voice Chat. Powered by PyTgCalls.

ASSISTANT.description: Isi dengan username assistant kalian tanpa tanda @

UPDATES_CHANNEL.description: Isi dengan id channel atau group yang akan di jadikan forcesub

SUDO_USERS.description: List of user IDs counted as admin everywhere (separated by space).

GROUP.description: Isi dengan username group kalian tanpa tanda @

CHANNEL.description: Isi dengan username channel kalian tanpa tanda @

OWNER.description: Isi dengan username kalian tanpa tanda @

PANDUAN.description: Isi dengan fitur bot dalam format text yang kamu upload di telegra.ph

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Max audio duration limit for downloads (minutes).
